definition: live relay/broadcast of actual scene/to broadcast live
real/true/honest/really/solid/fruit/seed/definitely
moreover/situation
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: Nonprofits could use it to livestream video from events.
sentences.chinese: 非營利組織可以用它來進行公益事件的實況轉播。

sentences.english: The match will be broadcast live.
sentences.chinese: 這場比賽將作實況轉播。

sentences.english: We watched the football match on live show television.
sentences.chinese: 我們看了電視實況轉播的足球比賽。

sentences.english: We watched the football match on live television .
sentences.chinese: 我們看了電視實況轉播的足球賽。

sentences.english: The arrest of the two drug traffickers was broadcast live on the TV.
sentences.chinese: 緝拿兩名販毒分子的過程在電視上進行了實況轉播。

sentences.english: No. I watch live football games here, in my bar with my customers.
sentences.chinese: 不，我大總分時間在酒吧衙顧客一起看實況轉播。

sentences.english: The French Open will be transmitted live via satellite.
sentences.chinese: 法國網球公開賽會透過衛星實況轉播。

sentences.english: Invite parents to the media center to watch the in-house broadcast of morning exercises.
sentences.chinese: 邀請家長到媒體中心觀看學生的早操的實況轉播。

sentences.english: The Opening Ceremony will be televised on Cable TV.
sentences.chinese: 有線電視將實況轉播開幕式的盛況。

sentences.english: There is a live telecast of World Cup match at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 那有一場世界盃比賽的電視實況轉播。

sentences.english: It was the largest amount ever won on live TV at that time.
sentences.chinese: 在那時這是在實況轉播中贏得最大的一筆獎金。

sentences.english: Communi cation satellites have already been used for living transmission in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我國已將通訊衛星用於實況轉播。

sentences.english: Communication satellites have already been used for living transmission in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我國乙將通訊衛星用於實況轉播。

definition: the 7th day after a person's death/the first 7-day period after a person's death
Tun District – area of Taichung (in Taiwan) between the coastal (western) part of the city and the mountains to the east
audition/dress rehearsal/preview (of a theatrical performance)/dummy run
a hit/tremendous popularity
Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)
to be up to one's ears in work (idiom)/to be unable to attend to other things at the same time
everyone present applauds/universal acclaim/a standing ovation/to bring the house down
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
alarm (e.g. burglar or fire alarm)/warning device
top news story
sand picture
(coll.) to tamper with/to mess around with
to liven up the atmosphere
to volunteer for/to offer to undertake
the empty city stratagem (in which Zhuge Liang presents himself as unperturbed while making it evident that his city is undefended, hoping his adversary will suspect an ambush)/double bluff
clear and simple/in simple terms
